Well done Sarah and team! It looks great.

From Monday, we will begin setting up the catalogues on META/Google and we should be in a position to launch some advertising next week. Once the strategy/set-up is ready, we will book a meeting with yourself Sarah to run you over it all and get your sign off before going live.

Enjoy the weekend everyone!

Thanks,
Dimitri
